node.value:
--- 
api_server: 
  api_server_addr: "127.0.0.1"
  api_server_port: 9000
interval: 600
master_name: dhcp42-142.lab.eng.blr.redhat.com
thresholds: 
  cpu: 
    Failure: 90
    Warning: 80
  memory: 
    Failure: 90
    Warning: 80
  mount_point: 
    Failure: 90
    Warning: 80
  swap: 
    Failure: 70
    Warning: 50
